org.cora.graphics.base

Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cora.graphics.base.Image
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Image
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Create and handle images Texture are not copied just stored Support frames animation

        Create an image from part of texture
        Parameters:
        surface - texture
        x - left top x coordinate of the start of part of texture
        y - left top y coordiante of the start of part of texture
        width - width of part
        height - height of part

        height - height of part
        currentFrame - the nrd square with specified dimension
